summary_detail.value: The area closure on the Beaverhead-Deerlodge National Forest around the Meyers Fire has been updated to include area in the Anaconda-Pintler Wilderness. This includes the Continental Divide Trail from Cutaway Pass to Mystic

title: Meyers Fire Closure September 2, 2017 (Meyers Fire Wildfire)
summary: The area closure on the Beaverhead-Deerlodge National Forest around the Meyers Fire has been updated to include area in the Anaconda-Pintler Wilderness. This includes the Continental Divide Trail from Cutaway Pass to Mystic
